description.en: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.cns: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.de: Erhöht die Rate, mit der Gruppen-Exp gewonnen wird, um 50% und verbessert die Gruppen-Skills, indem es ihre Entfernungsbeschränkungen aufhebt. Erlaubt das Stapeln von Gruppen-Skills und kombiniert deren Dauer, aber nicht deren Effekt. Deine Gruppe erhält die doppelte Anzahl an Punkten, wenn sie ein neues Level erreicht. Wirkt, wenn der Gruppenleiter ihn aktiviert hat. (Hält einen Tag nach der Aktivierung an, auch wenn man abgemeldet ist)
description.fi: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: Augmente l'expérience de groupe de 50% et améliore les compétences de groupes. Permet de cumuler la durée des compétences de groupe mais pas leurs effets. Votre groupe recevra le double de points en passant un niveau. Fonctionne quand le chef de groupe l'a activé. (Dure 1 jour après activition, même hors connexion).
description.id: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. description.jp: パーティー経験値の獲得率を50%アップし、パーティースキルを強化して距離制限をなくします。パーティースキルを重複して持続時間を更新できますが効果は重複しません。あなたのパーティーは、新しいレベルに到達すると、2倍のポイントを獲得します。パーティーリーダーが起動している場合に機能します。(ログオフしても使用から1日有効)

description.sp: Aumenta la velocidad a la que se gana Exp Grupo en un 50 % y mejora las habilidades de Grupo, anulando sus limitaciones de distancia. Permite acumular habilidades, combinando su duración, pero no su efecto. Tu Grupo obtendrá el doble de puntos al alcanzar otro nivel. Funciona cuando el líder del Grupo lo ha activado. (Dura 1 día desde la activación, incluso si estás desconectado)
